vote.motion-ch: 動議中止議程文件FCR(2017-18)42 – PWSC(2017-18)12的討論
vote.motion-en: Motion that discussion on FCR(2017-18)42 – PWSC(2017-18)12 be now adjourned

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案(編號：1)
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure (No. 1)

vote.motion-ch: 動議其後就相同議程項目下任何議案或待議議題進行點名表決時，委員會須在點名表決鐘聲響起一分鐘後進行點名表決
vote.motion-en: Motion that in the event of further divisions being claimed of any motions or questions under the same agenda item, the Committee do proceed such divisions immediately after the division bell has been rung for one minute

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案(編號：2)
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure (No. 2)

vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure (No. 3)

vote.motion-en: FCR(2017-18)42 – PWSC(2017-18)12 RECOMMENDATION OF THE PUBLIC WORKS SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 4 JULY 2017 – Integrated Basement for West Kowloon Cultural District
